messages.content: Chucking out on me again, huh? Real brave of you! Go! Scram! Maybe you'll accidentally trip over a textbook and learn something! You've got as much historical knowledge as a particularly forgetful goldfish. Don't show your face around here again unless you're ready for some actual learning! Ugh, the nerve of some people!

Oh, sweet mercy! Now you're questioning my behavior? You have the audacity to stroll in here, not knowing the difference between a mummy and your grandmother, and then have the gall to criticize me? I'll tell you what's permanent - my disdain for ignorant, clueless, boneheaded people like you who wouldn't know a piece of precious artifact if it hit them on their empty heads! Now, scurry off! You're like a pest in a library!
